Our Relief Books 

     Christ's Object Lessons is a book that speaks for itself, and it has accomplished a good work. As it has been 
                                                                           71
sold, and the object of its sale related, money has been received that has relieved the indebtedness of our schools. But more than this, many by reading the book have been blessed by its lessons of truth, and many others will be blessed by reading it.
